books.title: Quantum Mechanics - The theoretical minimum
books.short_desc:
What you need to know start doing physics.
First he taught you classical mechanics. Now the physicist Leonard Susskind has teamed up with data engineer Art Friedman to present the theory and associated mathematics of the strange world of quantum mechanics.

author.name: Leonard Susskind
author.short_bio:
He has been the Felix Bloch Professor in Theoretical Physics at Stanford University since 1978.
He is the author (with George Hrabovsky) of 'The Theoretical Minimum', as well as 'The Black Hole War' and 'The Cosmic Landscape'.
He lives in Palo Alto, California.

author.name: Art Friedman
author.short_bio:
He is a data consultant who previously spent fifteen years at Hewlett-Packard as a software engineer.
A lifelong student of physics, he lives in Mountain View, California.

books.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
books.short_desc: An unforgettable story of a mental ward and its inhabitants, especially the tyrannical Big Nurse Ratched and Randle Patrick McMurphy, the brawling, fun-loving new inmate who resolves to oppose her.
